content:
**size ** flower is 2 inches 5 1 cm high and 9 inches 22 9 cm across candle is any height desired
**yarn requirements ** acrylic 4-ply knitting worsted weight yarn * 1 oz red for flower * 1/2 oz color of choice for candle * few yards pale gold for stamens * few yards yellow for flame **other requirements ** * size g hook * cardboard tube toilet paper or paper towels * yarn needle direct pdf link http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/xmascandles pdf 1 > previously available at the crochet works http //www sarahanns com/crochetworks/xmas html 1 http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/xmascandles pdf
